title: Sri Lanka: More Cabinet Ministers appointed
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Several more Cabinet Ministers took oaths in the presence of President Gotabaya Rajapaksa on Monday (23).
4. Vidura Wickramanayake – Buddha Sasana, Religious and Cultural Affairs
5. Mahinda Amaraweera – Agriculture, Wildlife and Forest Resources Conservation
On the 20th of May, Sri Lanka appointed 9 Cabinet Ministers, including those from Opposition Parties.
1. Nimal Siripala De Silva – Ports, Naval and Aviation Services
On the 3rd of May 2022, Sri Lanka appointed its first new Cabinet under Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe.
